title: 27. Rebecca Sedwick - Bullying Taken Too Far
description:
In this episode of Murder With My Husband, Payton tells Garrett the different true crime story of Rebecca Sedwick. When is bullying taken too far?

Case Sources:
http://www.bullyingstatistics.org/content/cyber-bullying-statistics.html
https://www.legacy.com/obituaries/theledger/obituary.aspx?n=rebecca-ann-sedwick-becca&pid=166939688&fhid=3990
https://www.cnn.com/2014/04/18/living/rebecca-sedwick-bullying-suicide-follow-parents/index.html
https://www.wlrn.org/education/2013-10-15/the-rise-of-cyberbullying-the-case-of-rebecca-sedwick
https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/nation/2013/10/15/florida-bullying-arrest-lakeland-suicide/2986079/
https://www.nytimes.com/2013/09/14/us/suicide-of-girl-after-bullying-raises-worries-on-web-sites.html
https://www.cbsnews.com/news/rebecca-sedwick-case-bullied-girl-and-her-tormentor-both-grew-up-in-disturbing-family-situations-says-sheriff/

Check out our Social Media:
https://www.facebook.com/mwithmyhusband/
https://www.instagram.com/murderwithmyhusband/
https://twitter.com/murderwmhusband

Case Suggestion:
Juliette on Instagram 

Suicide Prevention Lifeline:
800-273-8255
